trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_SEQ_00<tab>Helmhart of Highbridge could use an adventurer's assistance with a hair-raising problem.

TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_SEQ_01<tab>Helmhart has a grievous physical ailment which requires immediate treatment. Slay phurbles around Highbridge to obtain three bottles of phurble blood, and deliver them to Helmhart with all speed.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_SEQ_02<tab>You have successfully obtained the requisite bottles of phurble blood. Hasten back to Helmhart and deliver them before his condition deteriorates.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_SEQ_03<tab>Helmhart concocts a potent hair tonic with the phurble blood you retrieved. Apply it liberally to his head, that his locks might flow forth once more.

TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_SEQ_04<tab>Having applied the hair tonic to his shiny pate, Helmhart rejoices at the pleasant tingling sensation it affords. Whether it has any effect beyond this remains to be seen.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_TODO_00<tab>Slay phurbles to obtain their blood.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bottles of phurble blood to Helmhart.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_TODO_02<tab>Apply the hair tonic to Helmhart's head.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_000<tab>You! Yes, you! Adventurer! I need you to fetch three bottles of phurble blood, and do so with all haste!
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_001<tab>Where to find phurble blood, you ask? Why, from phurbles, of course! Now hurry! This is a matter of life and death!
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_020<tab>Well? Have you brought the phurble blood I asked for? If so, then hand it over, and quickly now!
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_025<tab>At long last! My friend, you're a godssend! Now, how did it go? Ah, yes─stir twice, a dash of spittle, shake thrice more, and...voilà!
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_026<tab>Well, what are you waiting for, friend? Grab yourself a dollop and start spreading─my scalp cries out for succor! Oh, and do try not to miss a spot.
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_031<tab>My, that tingles! Why, I can already feel my pores opening! In no time at all, I'll have flowing locks a fulm long!
TEXT_GAIUSA409_00751_HELMHART_000_032<tab>I can't thank you enough, friend. What with the sun beating down the way it does in these parts, a bald pate is a potentially fatal affliction.
